DOC.brief_summary: The current study investigates the effects of tDCS in patients with multiple sclerosis (MS). The investigators hypothesize that anodal tDCS will increase motor performance in patients with MS.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Anodal tDCS on Motor Learning in Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: at least 18 years old male and female relapse in the last 3 months when not suitable for tDCS (screening) if TMS measures can not be completed
